description: A rally-bred sedan that treats public roads like a special stage. The Crimson EVO combines turbo power, all-wheel drive, and active differentials into a package that defies physics. Launch control off the line, then point-and-shoot through every corner.
lore: Eclipse built the Crimson EVO to win rallies, then sold it to the public so they could homologate it. The active center differential splits torque front-to-rear on the fly, and the turbo four punches way above its displacement. It's the car that taught a generation that sedans could be weapons.
